title: How well are hybrid vehlcles doing in the EU?
subtitle: In 2024, 38% of all newly registered passenger cars were hybrid. This indicates an incline in market share, up from 33.5% in 2023.
textNote: For this analysis, all major passenger-car propulsion systems were considered. These include petrol and diesel engines, plug-in hybrid petrol-electric and diesel-electric systems, other hybrid configurations, battery-electric vehicles, and hydrogen or fuel-cell vehicles.A hybrid vehicle charges its battery through the engine and regenerative braking, while a plug-in hybrid can additionally be charged from an external power source to drive longer on electric power alone.
